thread.title: How big is the Nintendo Switch? These photos show you - CNET
thread.title_full: How big is the Nintendo Switch? These photos show you - CNET

author: Luke Lancaster
title: How big is the Nintendo Switch? These photos show you - CNET
text:
1 of 18 How big is the Nintendo Switch? These photos show you 
Think the new Nintendo Switch is about the same size as the Wii U Gamepad ? Think again... Photo by: James Martin/CNET Pricing is currently unavailable. Photo by: James Martin/CNET Pricing is currently unavailable. 
Both devices use Nvidia Tegra chips, but guess which one wins on sleekness? (Hint: Not the Nvidia Shield .) Photo by: James Martin/CNET Pricing is currently unavailable. 
Docked, it'll take up less shelf space than the Wii. And it'll sit at a less jaunty angle, but you might not be as happy about that. Photo by: James Martin/CNET Pricing is currently unavailable. Photo by: James Martin/CNET Pricing is currently unavailable. 
The Joy-Con grip looks amazingly similar in size to the GameCube controller, which may be the best controller Nintendo's ever designed. Photo by: James Martin/CNET Pricing is currently unavailable. 
Throw it back to the Game Boy, and you can see how far we've come. They're all barely bigger than the 1989 handheld. Photo by: James Martin/CNET Pricing is currently unavailable. 
Here it is with the NES Classic . Honestly don't know which of the two is harder to come by.
